entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Mont-Saint-Hilaire
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Hubert Airport 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -15.5°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
